divs: Sighting Details12 am new years, looking at fireworks and listening to gunfire. looked up at the sky and saw a orange object flying toward me, thought it was aplane but then it stopped and started flashing bright white light and then it drop orange flames that looked like fire and then disappeared. then i see another object coming the same way, it stopped in the same place as the last one and dropped flames and disappeared, then the third object came and stopped in the same place and dropped flames and then disappeared. never saw anything like that before!!!
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Fontana
There were no other sightings in Fontana on or around January 1st 2013
